picked_headlines.summary: CudaForge optimizes CUDA kernels with hardware feedback, boosting accuracy and speed.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a significant advancement in CUDA kernel optimization, offering practical benefits for engineers and developers working with GPU-accelerated applications.

picked_headlines.summary: AI/ML system assesses building damage from sUAS imagery, enhancing disaster response.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a practical application of AI in disaster management, showcasing its potential to improve real-world outcomes and engage stakeholders in emergency response sectors.

digest:
- *TabTune* offers a unified library for tabular model fine-tuning, enhancing performance: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.02802
- *PerfDojo* automates ML optimization for diverse architectures, improving performance without hardware expertise: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.03586
- *EQ-Negotiator* empowers small language models for credit negotiation using emotional personas: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.03370
- *RoboRAN* provides a framework for RL-based autonomous navigation across robots, enhancing adaptability: https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.14526
- *SME-TEAM* framework helps SMEs adopt AI responsibly, focusing on trust and ethics: https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.10594
- *Agent-Omni* enables state-of-the-art multimodal reasoning without retraining: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.02834
- *AnalogSeeker* improves analog circuit design with open-source LLMs: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.10409
- *Generative AI in Bioinformatics* reviews AI's impact on bioinformatics, highlighting model advancements: https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.03354
- *SLED* enhances LLM inference on edge devices with speculative decoding: https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.09397
- *PhysicsEval* introduces new benchmarks for LLMs in physics problem-solving: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.00079
